history.proof: intros. hauto use: ln_increasing unfold: Rle.

exceptions.exn: In environment x, y : R H : 0 < x H0 : x <= y Unable to unify "ln ?M2285 < ln ?M2286" with "ln x < ln y \\/ ln x = ln y".

In environment r : R -> R H1 : forall (a b : R) (f : R -> R) (pr : derivable f), a < b -> (forall t : R, a < t < b -> 0 < derive_pt f t (pr t)) -> forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> x < y -> f x < f y x, y : R H : 0 < x H0 : x <= y Unable to unify "ln ?M2695 < ln ?M2696" with "r x < r y \\/ r x = r y".

original: intros. apply (derive_increasing_interv _ _ ln _). - auto. - apply ln_increasing; auto. - lra.
